trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The wayward child seems to be searching for someone.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the wayward child and have him accompany you.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_TODO_01<tab>Accompany the wayward child to Scanning Port Nine and speak with him at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_TODO_02<tab>Accompany the wayward child to the information center and speak with him at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_TODO_03<tab>Accompany the wayward child to the government sector and speak with his mother.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_000<tab>Hey, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>, do you have a moment?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_001<tab>My ma's gone missing. She's kinda careless and none too used to the city. I figure she's gotten lost.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_002<tab>Anyway, I need some help to look for her, which is where you come in! If you can spare the time, just let me know!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_003<tab>Yay! You're the best! I wasn't making much headway─the sentries stop kids wandering around without an adult in tow...
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_004<tab>I think Ma would have headed back to the entrance of the city. I mean, I told her: if you get lost, make your way back to where you started.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_005<tab>In other words, we need to head for Scanning Port Nine! I'm sure we'll find her in no time.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>The wayward child is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>You can leave the wayward child behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>If you wish to have the wayward child accompany you again, return and speak with him at the original location.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A1_000_002<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_009<tab>Knowing my ma, she's probably feeling kinda helpless right now. I hope we find her soon...
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_Q4_000_000<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with the wayward child?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_010<tab>Oh, you were busy after all? Um, that's okay, I'll just wait for you where you first found me!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_100_010<tab>Oh, hey, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>! Ready to go find my ma now?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A3_000_100<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the advertisement panel.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_011<tab>Look, look, it's the air-wheeler A9! That's the latest air-gadget! The wheels turn into wings and it goes flying off into the sky! It's amazing!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_012<tab>The ones they use for fighting have a bunch of different weapons: wing blades, shock cannons─all sorts! You can even get little toy versions!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_013<tab>I'd love to ride one someday, but the robot soldiers are pretty much the only ones allowed to, apparently. <sigh> Lucky machines...
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A4_000_100<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss the leynode.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_014<tab>I don't think Ma would've used the leynode. They have these on the other levels too, but you need Queen Sphene's permission to use them.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_015<tab>We have to use the elevators instead. I guess you do too, right?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_016<tab>Huh? Her Majesty lets you use the leynodes? Whoa...you must be really important!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_020<tab>Wow! They have Gimme Bat Nutri-zap!

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_021<tab>Ma's always drinking the stuff, but she never lets <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> try. According to her, I don't need any more energy, but <var 1A 02 /var>she<var 1A 01 /var> has a can practically every day... I bet it tastes incredible.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_022<tab>Say, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>, why don't you buy one and...you know, let me have a little sip. Just a tiny one! Pleeease.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A2_000_001<tab>I have no idea how these newfangled contraptions work...
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A2_000_002<tab>Are you sure it's the kind of thing children should be drinking?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_A2_000_003<tab>Sorry. Not today, kid.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_MOB05166_000_023<tab>(-Good-natured Citizen-)Anything amiss?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_MOB05166_000_024<tab>(-Good-natured Citizen-)Helping to track down this boy's mother, are you? I see, I see. Good thing he ran into such a kindly sort!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_MOB05166_000_025<tab>(-Good-natured Citizen-)Ah, how about I give you this? Unopened and bought just moments ago: a can of Gimme Bat Nutri-zap!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_026<tab>For me? Really!? Thank you!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_MOB05166_000_027<tab>(-Good-natured Citizen-)You're more than welcome! There's just one condition: make sure you ask your mother's permission before you try.

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_MOB05166_000_028<tab>(-Good-natured Citizen-)Gimme Bat Nutri-zap is an energy drink specially formulated to keep your digestive system in tip-top shape. It's perfectly safe for youngsters to drink, so you needn't worry on that front.

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_MOB05166_000_029<tab>(-Good-natured Citizen-)By the way, it might be worth your while dropping by Leander's shop in the information center. I hear he has a knack for remembering faces.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_030<tab>Do you think that's Leander?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_031<tab>Ah, you're one of Her Majesty's esteemed guests! How might I assist you and your young companion?

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_032<tab>So you're looking for this young man's mother, and you wish to know if I've spotted her. Hmmm. Well, I'm sure you can appreciate that we get a fair amount of foot traffic through here... Perhaps you could start by describing what she looks like─that might help jog my memory.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_033<tab>Um, well, she has long hair, and she's dressed in blue. What else... Ah! She makes those sweets you've got on that shelf behind you!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_034<tab>The Angel Snacks? I believe those are manufactured in the production facility on the seventh level. I'd wager that's where your mother works.

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_035<tab>I'm sure you're already aware, but Everkeep is comprised of twelve levels, each fulfilling a different purpose. There are sectors for food production, machinery manufacture and much more besides.

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_036<tab>Ah, look at me getting sidetracked. I saw a woman matching your description heading towards the government sector a little while earlier. I daresay you'll catch her if you leave now.

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_037<tab>I do remember thinking she looked rather unsettled, which makes sense in hindsight, having heard your story. There's a civic advisory facility in the government sector, perhaps she's heading there to inform them of the situation.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_038<tab>Thanks for the information, mister!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_LEANDER_000_039<tab>As I said, I think the young man's mother was heading for the government sector. She might have had her sights set on the civic advisory facility.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_200_040<tab>That boy... Where could he have gotten to?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>The wayward child has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_SYSTEM_300_040<tab>You must be accompanied by the wayward child and have him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_000_040<tab>Ah, there you are! I've been looking all over for you...
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_041<tab>Ma! So you <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> heading for the government sector. We were about to go and look for you there!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_000_042<tab>“We”? Who's this newfound friend of yours?
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_043<tab><var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> been helping me look for you, Ma! Together, we figured out where you might be headed!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_000_044<tab>I see... No doubt you had your hands full with this one. Thank you for your patience and for being so thoughtful.
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_000_045<tab>As for you, young man─dashing around the city on your own like that!
TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_000_046<tab>Did you even think to stop and consider how worried I'd be!?

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYKID05166_000_047<tab>Honestly, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>, before you showed up, I was starting to get scared... It was such a relief when I spotted you. Thanks so much for helping me find my ma!

TEXT_KINGZG003_05166_STRAYMOTHER05166_000_049<tab>Thanks again for everything you've done. It isn't much, but I couldn't let you wander off without giving you this. I hope you enjoy your time here in the city─just don't go getting lost like a certain young man and his mother...ahem.
